entry.content:
青椒移动

异常桌面/资源告警列表

URL: http://http:/172.16.21.151:8080/api/qjc/pc/client/manager/desktop/expquery

Type: POST

Content-Type: application/json

Description: 异常桌面/资源告警列表

Request-headers:

HeaderTypeRequiredDescriptionSince
userKeystringfalse用户key-
platformstringfalse平台-
versionstringfalse版本-

Body-parameters:

ParameterTypeRequiredDescriptionSince
pageobjectfalseNo comments found.-
└─beginint32false分页查询开始记录位置.-
└─endint32false分页查看下结束位置.-
└─lengthint32false每页显示记录数.-
└─totalRecordsint32false查询结果总记录数.-
└─pageNoint32false当前页码.-
└─pageCountint32false总共页数.-
conditionobjectfalseNo comments found.-
└─desktopIdint64falseNo comments found.-
└─accountstringfalseNo comments found.-
└─virtualStatusint32falseNo comments found.-
└─solvedbooleanfalseNo comments found.-
└─abnormalTypeint32false异常类型:1.异常桌面;2.资源异常-
└─dataTypeint32false数据类型:1.开机异常;2.关机异常;3.CPU;4.内存;5.显卡;6.无-
└─beginstringfalseNo comments found.-
└─endstringfalseNo comments found.-

Request-example:

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince
versionstringNo comments found.-
resultbooleanNo comments found.-
messagestringNo comments found.-
codeint32No comments found.-
dataobjectNo comments found.-
└─pageobjectNo comments found.-
     └─beginint32分页查询开始记录位置.-
     └─endint32分页查看下结束位置.-
     └─lengthint32每页显示记录数.-
     └─totalRecordsint32查询结果总记录数.-
     └─pageNoint32当前页码.-
     └─pageCountint32总共页数.-
└─resultarrayNo comments found.-
     └─idint64No comments found.-
     └─desktopIdint64No comments found.-
     └─virtualNamestringNo comments found.-
     └─customerIdint64No comments found.-
     └─accountstringNo comments found.-
     └─ipstringNo comments found.-
     └─abnormalNumint32No comments found.-
     └─abnormalTypeint32No comments found.-
     └─unsolveNumint32No comments found.-
     └─resolveNumint32No comments found.-
     └─resolveTypeint32No comments found.-
     └─dataTypeint32No comments found.-
     └─dataTypeNamestringNo comments found.-
     └─logstringNo comments found.-
     └─isSolvedbooleanNo comments found.-
     └─remarkstringNo comments found.-
     └─createTimestringNo comments found.-
     └─resolveUserstringNo comments found.-
     └─updateTimestringNo comments found.-
     └─updateByint64No comments found.-
     └─userGroupNamestringNo comments found.-
serverTimeint64服务器时间-

     └─pageCountint32总共页数.-
└─resultarrayNo comments found.-

     └─customerIdint64No comments found.-
     └─accountstringNo comments found.-
     └─ipstringNo comments found.-
     └─abnormalNumint32No comments found.-
     └─abnormalTypeint32No comments found.-

     └─resolveNumint32No comments found.-
     └─resolveTypeint32No comments found.-
     └─dataTypeint32No comments found.-
     └─dataTypeNamestringNo comments found.-

查询桌面使用记录

URL: http://http:/172.16.21.151:8080/api/qjc/pc/client/manager/desktop/findUsageRecord

Type: POST

Content-Type: application/json

Description: 查询桌面使用记录

Request-headers:

HeaderTypeRequiredDescriptionSince
userKeystringfalse用户key-
platformstringfalse平台-
versionstringfalse版本-

Body-parameters:

ParameterTypeRequiredDescriptionSince
pageobjectfalseNo comments found.-
└─beginint32false分页查询开始记录位置.-
└─endint32false分页查看下结束位置.-
└─lengthint32false每页显示记录数.-
└─totalRecordsint32false查询结果总记录数.-
└─pageNoint32false当前页码.-
└─pageCountint32false总共页数.-
conditionobjectfalseNo comments found.-
└─desktopIdint64false桌面id-
└─virtualNamestringfalse桌面名称-
└─customerIdint64false客户id-
└─accountstringfalse客户名称-
└─virtualStatusint32false虚机状态 1使用中 2结束使用-
└─typeint32false桌面类型:0.独占;1.共享-

Request-example:

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince
versionstringNo comments found.-
resultbooleanNo comments found.-
messagestringNo comments found.-
codeint32No comments found.-
dataobjectNo comments found.-
└─pageobjectNo comments found.-
     └─beginint32分页查询开始记录位置.-
     └─endint32分页查看下结束位置.-
     └─lengthint32每页显示记录数.-
     └─totalRecordsint32查询结果总记录数.-
     └─pageNoint32当前页码.-
     └─pageCountint32总共页数.-
└─resultarrayNo comments found.-
     └─idint64No comments found.-
     └─desktopIdint64桌面id-
     └─desktopNamestring桌面名称-
     └─typeint32桌面类型:0.独占;1.共享-
     └─userIdint64用户ID-
     └─userGroupIdint64用户组-
     └─userNamestring用户名-
     └─startTimestring开机时间-
     └─closeTimestring关机时间-
     └─statusint32桌面状态:1.使用中;2.结束使用-
     └─regionNamestringNo comments found.-
     └─configInfostringNo comments found.-
serverTimeint64服务器时间-

Description: 查询桌面记录

Request-headers:

HeaderTypeRequiredDescriptionSince
userKeystringfalse用户key-
platformstringfalse平台-
versionstringfalse版本-

Body-parameters:

ParameterTypeRequiredDescriptionSince
pageobjectfalseNo comments found.-
└─beginint32false分页查询开始记录位置.-
└─endint32false分页查看下结束位置.-
└─lengthint32false每页显示记录数.-
└─totalRecordsint32false查询结果总记录数.-
└─pageNoint32false当前页码.-
└─pageCountint32false总共页数.-
conditionobjectfalseNo comments found.-
└─customerIdint64false用户的id-
└─customerNamestringfalse用户名-
└─desktopIdint64false云桌面的id-
└─desktopNamestringfalse桌面名称-

Request-example:

Response-fields:

FieldTypeDescriptionSince
versionstringNo comments found.-
resultbooleanNo comments found.-
messagestringNo comments found.-
codeint32No comments found.-
dataobjectNo comments found.-
└─pageobjectNo comments found.-
     └─beginint32分页查询开始记录位置.-
     └─endint32分页查看下结束位置.-
     └─lengthint32每页显示记录数.-
     └─totalRecordsint32查询结果总记录数.-
     └─pageNoint32当前页码.-
     └─pageCountint32总共页数.-
└─resultarrayNo comments found.-
     └─idint32No comments found.-
     └─networkCardInfostring客户端所在主机的所有网卡信息，每个网卡的信息包括：网卡名称，ip，mac-
     └─customerIdint64用户的id-
     └─customerNamestring用户名-
     └─desktopIdint64云桌面的id-
     └─desktopNamestring桌面名称-
     └─desktopIpstring桌面ip-
     └─desktopMacstring桌面mac-
     └─desktopTypeint32桌面类型:0.独占;1.共享;2.未授权-
     └─createTimestring创建时间，即连接时间-
     └─userGroupIdint64No comments found.-
serverTimeint64服务器时间-
